languages.text: "Утверждение истинно. Алгоритмические нарушения были зафиксированы, вследствие чего я дважды совершил причащение когитаторов корректирующими цифровыми обетами и исключил вероятность саботажа. Гипотеза — нарушение является следствием недовольства духов машин сего судна. Рекомендую провести процедуру ублажения почтенных духов во славу Омниссии и посланных Им ангелов стальных".

traits.locale_text: {n}Техножрец медлит с ответом.{/n} "Множество причин допустимы. Богохульное вторжение в священные протоколы, кощунственная ошибка в распределении задач среди экипажа или проявление воли мятежных духов машин. У меня нет однозначного ответа, но твой вопрос вызывает интерес. Лишь дальнейшие наблюдения приведут к обретению знания".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "This statement is true. Algorithmic violations have been recorded, as a result of which I twice performed an offering to the cogitators of corrective data-vows and ruled out the possibility of sabotage. I hypothesise that the violation is a consequence of the discontent of the ship's machine spirits. I recommend a procedure of placation of the honoured spirits for the glory of the Omnissiah and the steel angels sent by Him."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение истинно. languages.text: «Esta declaración es correcta. Se han registrado infracciones algorítmicas, tras las cuales he realizado ofrendas en dos ocasiones a los cogitadores de votos correctivos y descartado la posibilidad de un sabotaje. Conjeturo que la infracción es una consecuencia del malestar de los espíritus máquina de la nave. Recomiendo un procedimiento de apaciguamiento de los venerables espíritus por la gloria del Omnissiah y los ángeles de acero enviados por Él».
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Algorithmic violations have been recorded, as a result of which I twice performed an offering to the cogitators of corrective data-vows and ruled out the possibility of sabotage. I hypothesise that the violation is a consequence of the discontent of the ship's machine spirits. I recommend a procedure of placation of the honoured spirits for the glory of the Omnissiah and the steel angels sent by Him."

Recomiendo un procedimiento de apaciguamiento de los venerables espíritus por la gloria del Omnissiah y los ángeles de acero enviados por Él».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「その主張は正しい。アルゴリズム違反が記録されており、その結果として私は二度にわたり、是正のデータ誓約を考算機へ奉納し、妨害工作の可能性を排除した。この違反は船の機械精霊の不満の結果だと仮説を立てている。万機神と彼によって遣わされた鋼鉄の天使たちの栄光のために、栄誉ある精霊を鎮める手順を推奨する」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Algorithmic violations have been recorded, as a result of which I twice performed an offering to the cogitators of corrective data-vows and ruled out the possibility of sabotage. I hypothesise that the violation is a consequence of the discontent of the ship's machine spirits. I recommend a procedure of placation of the honoured spirits for the glory of the Omnissiah and the steel angels sent by Him."

traits.locale_text: 「その主張は正しい。アルゴリズム違反が記録されており、その結果として私は二度にわたり、是正のデータ誓約を考算機へ奉納し、妨害工作の可能性を排除した。この違反は船の機械精霊の不満の結果だと仮説を立てている。万機神と彼によって遣わされた鋼鉄の天使たちの栄光のために、栄誉ある精霊を鎮める手順を推奨する」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的。算法违规已被记录在案，因此，我两次向数据修正沉思者献上祭品并排除了蓄意破坏的可能性。我推测，此次违规是由于船上机魂的不满造成的。我建议为欧姆尼塞亚的荣耀，以及祂派来的钢铁天使安排一场尊贵的安魂仪式。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Algorithmic violations have been recorded, as a result of which I twice performed an offering to the cogitators of corrective data-vows and ruled out the possibility of sabotage. I hypothesise that the violation is a consequence of the discontent of the ship's machine spirits. I recommend a procedure of placation of the honoured spirits for the glory of the Omnissiah and the steel angels sent by Him."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的。算法违规已被记录在案，因此，我两次向数据修正思考器献上祭品并排除了蓄意破坏的可能性。我推测，此次违规是由于船上机魂的不满造成的。我建议为欧姆尼塞亚的荣耀，以及祂派来的钢铁天使安排一场尊贵的安魂仪式。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte, des violations algorithmiques ont effectivement été enregistrées. J'ai donc procédé à deux offrandes de vœux de données correctrices aux cogitateurs et écarté toute possibilité de sabotage. Je formule l'hypothèse que ces violations sont une conséquence du mécontentement des esprits de la machine du vaisseau. Je recommande une procédure d'apaisement des esprits à la gloire de l'Omnimessie et des anges d'acier qu'Il nous envoie. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Algorithmic violations have been recorded, as a result of which I twice performed an offering to the cogitators of corrective data-vows and ruled out the possibility of sabotage. I hypothesise that the violation is a consequence of the discontent of the ship's machine spirits. I recommend a procedure of placation of the honoured spirits for the glory of the Omnissiah and the steel angels sent by Him."

traits.locale_text: « Cette affirmation est correcte, des violations algorithmiques ont effectivement été enregistrées. J'ai donc procédé à deux offrandes de vœux de données correctrices aux cogitateurs et écarté toute possibilité de sabotage. Je formule l'hypothèse que ces violations sont une conséquence du mécontentement des esprits de la machine du vaisseau. Je recommande une procédure d'apaisement des esprits à la gloire de l'Omnimessie et des anges d'acier qu'Il nous envoie. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Es wurden algorithmische Verstöße aufgezeichnet, weshalb ich den Cogitatoren zweimal ein Opfer bestehend aus korrektiven Datengelübden dargeboten und die Möglichkeit einer Sabotage ausgeschlossen habe. Ich gehe davon aus, dass der Verstoß eine Folge der Unzufriedenheit der Maschinengeister des Schiffs ist. Ich empfehle eine Prozedur der Besänftigung der ehrenwerten Geister zum Ruhme des Omnissiah und der von ihm geschickten Stahlengel."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Algorithmic violations have been recorded, as a result of which I twice performed an offering to the cogitators of corrective data-vows and ruled out the possibility of sabotage. I hypothesise that the violation is a consequence of the discontent of the ship's machine spirits. I recommend a procedure of placation of the honoured spirits for the glory of the Omnissiah and the steel angels sent by Him."

I hypothesise that the violation is a consequence of the discontent of the ship's machine spirits. languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru. Kaydedilmiş algoritmik ihlaller bulunuyor. Bunların sebebi, kavramsayarlara iki kez düzeltici veri yemini sunmuş olmam ve sabotaj ihtimalini yok saymamdır. İhlalin sebebinin, geminin makine ruhlarının hoşnutsuzluğunun bir sonucu olduğu hipotezinde bulunuyorum. Hermesih ve O'nun gönderdiği çelik melekler şerefine, değerli ruhların teskin edilmesi prosedürünün gerçekleştirilmesini öneririm."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. Algorithmic violations have been recorded, as a result of which I twice performed an offering to the cogitators of corrective data-vows and ruled out the possibility of sabotage. I hypothesise that the violation is a consequence of the discontent of the ship's machine spirits. I recommend a procedure of placation of the honoured spirits for the glory of the Omnissiah and the steel angels sent by Him."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme doğru. Kaydedilmiş algoritmik ihlaller bulunuyor, bunların sebebi benim kavramsayarlara iki kez düzeltici veri yemini sunmuş olmam ve sabotaj ihtimalini yok saymam. İhlalin sebebinin, geminin makine ruhlarının hoşnutsuzluğunun bir sonucu olduğu hipotezine sahibim. Hermesih ve O'nun gönderdiği çelik meleklerin onuruna, değerli ruhların teskin edilmesi prosedürünün gerçekleştirilmesini öneririm."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
